question.text:
Match the enzymes given in column I with the substrates they act upon in column II and the product obtained from the reaction given in column III and select the correct option from the codes given below.
 
No. Enzyme No. Substrate No. Product
I Trypsin i Polysaccharides a Diglycerides
II Amylase ii Nucleic acids b Dipeptides
III Lipase iii Proteins c Nucleosides
IV Nuclease iv Fats d Disaccharides

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></math>

solution.text:
I. Trypsin acts on proteins to form dipeptides.

II. Amylase acts on polysaccharides to form disaccharides.

III. Lipase acts on fats to form diglycerides.

IV. Nuclease acts on nucleic acids to form nucleosides.
